This is an old issue but I hope it is still helpful to someone.

I believe this is not a problem with tensorflow api.

@zendelcrow
From what I am seeing, your training hits OOM since you only allowed 0.4 of your total gpu memory --- which is much much smaller than what your model demands. Please set allow_growth or use 1.0 fraction to fully utilize your gpu, and possibly a smaller batch_size would also reduce memory requirement.
@cshanbo hope it helps
